Package it.unicam.cs.formula1.TrackOperation

Interface TrackOperation

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultTrackOperation
public interface TrackOperation
Defines operations for manipulating and verifying positions on a track. Provides methods to check the validity and passability of positions and tracks, and to generate nearby positions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Position>
    calculateNearbyMoves(Position position)
    Calculates and returns a list of valid nearby positions to the specified position.
    boolean
    checkPassableTrack(Position start, Position arrive)
    Checks if a track between two positions is passable.
    void
    executeNearbyMove(Bot bot)
    Executes a nearby move for the specified bot if the main point is not valid or if the bot is unable to move directly to a valid position
    boolean
    isValidAndPassable(Position mainPoint, Position mainPoint1, Position mainPoint2)
    Checks if the specified positions are valid and if the tracks between them are passable.
    boolean
    isValidPosition(Position position)
    Checks if the specified position is valid within the track

  • Method Details

    • isValidAndPassable

      boolean isValidAndPassable(Position mainPoint, Position mainPoint1, Position mainPoint2)
      Checks if the specified positions are valid and if the tracks between them are passable.
      Parameters:
      mainPoint - the main position to check from
      mainPoint1 - the first subsequent position to check after the main position
      mainPoint2 - the second subsequent position to check
      Returns:
      true if all positions are valid and the tracks between them are passable, false otherwise

    • checkPassableTrack

      boolean checkPassableTrack(Position start, Position arrive)
      Checks if a track between two positions is passable. This method uses Bresenham's line algorithm to determine the passability of the track.
      Parameters:
      start - the starting position
      arrive - the ending position
      Returns:
      true if the track between start and arrive is passable, false otherwise

    • calculateNearbyMoves

      List<Position> calculateNearbyMoves(Position position)
      Calculates and returns a list of valid nearby positions to the specified position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position to calculate nearby moves from
      Returns:
      a list of Position representing valid nearby positions

    • isValidPosition

      boolean isValidPosition(Position position)
      Checks if the specified position is valid within the track
      Parameters:
      position - the position to check
      Returns:
      true if the position is within the track limits and not marked as invalid, false otherwise

    • executeNearbyMove

      void executeNearbyMove(Bot bot)
      Executes a nearby move for the specified bot if the main point is not valid or if the bot is unable to move directly to a valid position
      Parameters:
      bot - the bot for which execute the nearby move
